title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker (Black)

Simple to use. Big, clear sound.
- Turn it on, connect once by Bluetooth, and enjoy your music, radio, or calls. It remembers your phone or tablet next time.
- Voices and music sound deep and clear, even at low volume, so you don’t need to turn it up high.

Easy to carry and tough.
- Small and light. Slip it in a bag or hang it by the built‑in loop.
- Waterproof and dustproof (IP67). It even floats, so it’s safe by the sink, in the garden, or by the pool.
- Drop, sun, and rust resistant. Made to last.

All‑day battery.
- Up to 12 hours on a charge. Recharge with the included USB‑C cable (about 4 hours to full).

Helpful features.
- Built‑in microphone for clear phone calls.
- Works with Siri or Google Assistant for simple voice commands.
- Plays reliably up to about 30 feet from your device.

Optional easy app.
- The free Bose Connect app can update the speaker and adjust settings if you want. You can also use the speaker without the app.

Getting started is simple.
1) Charge it with the USB‑C cable.
2) Press the power button.
3) On your phone, turn on Bluetooth and choose “Bose SoundLink Flex.”
You’re ready to listen.

If you want a speaker that’s clear, simple, and sturdy, the Bose SoundLink Flex makes everyday listening easy and enjoyable.
